Package cz.cuni.mff.TDMSReader

Class DataReader

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.TDMSReader.DataReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeadInDataReader, MetaDataReader, RawDataReader
public class DataReader extends Object
Abstract class for reading data from a file.

    • readInt32

      public int readInt32(int offset) throws IOException
      Reads a 32-bit integer from the specified offset in the file.
      Parameters:
      offset - The offset in the file from which to read the integer.
      Returns:
      The integer read from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • readString

      public String readString(long offset, int length) throws IOException
      Reads a string from the specified offset in the file.
      Parameters:
      offset - The offset in the file from which to read the string.
      length - The length of the string to read.
      Returns:
      The string read from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • readBytes

      public byte[] readBytes(int offset, int length) throws IOException
      Reads bytes from the specified offset in the file.
      Parameters:
      offset - The offset in the file from which to read the bytes.
      length - The number of bytes to read.
      Returns:
      An array of bytes read from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.
